rules_text:
Vigilance
{1}{U}, {T}: Surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
{X}{G}, {T}, Exile a card with mana value X from your graveyard: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
